sentences.sentence: Despite flames and fury on the streets of France, President Macron officially signs his controversial pension reform into law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: There were flames and fury on the streets of France on Friday night, but it wasn't enough to stop President Macron from signing his controversial pension reform into law on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It comes just hours after the reform, which raises the retirement age from 62 to 64, was officially endorsed by the country's Constitutional Council.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Following the ruling, protests erupted across the country. a été officiellement indorcé par le Conseil constitutionnel du pays. En suivant la règle, les protestations ont évolué dans le pays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: En Paris, plus de 100 personnes ont été arrêtées.

sentences.sentence: Les unions ont appelé un grand débat nationnel le 1er mai.

sentences.sentence: L'intersyndical appelle à un 1er mai historique.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: C'est la première fois que l'ensemble des organisations syndicales appellent les salariés à manifester le 1er mai.

sentences.sentence: Ce sera donc un raz-de-marée popula will be a popular, massive, unprecedented, exceptional wave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Macron says the bill is necessary to stop the pension system from collapsing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The reforms are expected to come into effect by early September.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Three people have died and dozens more injured after fierce clashes erupted on Saturday across the country between the National Army and paramilitaries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The fighting comes after months of escalated tensions between the generals and years of political unrest after October 2021's military coup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It has brought the signing of an internationally backed deal to revive the nation's democratic tradition to a standstill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Both sides have blamed the other for initiating the violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: US President Joe Biden has confirmed he will run for re-election in 2024 in a statement to the press as he prepared to board Air Force One to return to the US from Ireland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The announcement followed a passionate address to tens of thousands of people outside a cathedral in his ancestral hometown in County Mayo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Everything between Ireland and America runs deep.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Our history, our heritage, our sorrows, our future, our friendship, our joys.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But more than anything, hope is what beats in the hearts of all our people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It was a homecoming trip for the U.S. president, whose great-great-great-grandfather, Edward Blewett,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: left Ballina for Scranton, Pennsylvania, in the 1850s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Going forward, the 80-year-old Democrat faces the prospect of again challenging former President Donald Trump in the race for the White House in what would be a rerun of the 2020 election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Greek Orthodox worshipers have been gathering in Jerusalem's Holy Sepulchre Church to celebrate the ceremony of the Holy Fire, in which a flame kindled from the heart of Jesus' tomb is shared among worshippers, before being transferred by relay to Russia, Greece and beyond.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Romanians have been on the roads to take advantage of their Easter weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Many travel into the mountains to enjoy skiing and tobogganing, while others prefer seaside resorts with thermal waters. In North Macedonia, believers left Easter eggs at the St. Clement Oritsky Cathedral. Traditionally they are accompanied by prayers for good health for the year to come.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Church bells also fell silent as a sign of mourning for Jesus' crucifixion.
